name: Electro Hypostasis
title: Electro Hypostasis
desc: Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.\nEven if you win at rock-paper-scissors, Aleph is not one to admit defeat.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Electro Hypostasis

skills.name: Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo
skills.desc: Deals 2 Electro DMG and then separately performs "Prepare Skill" for Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Scissors and Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Paper.

skills.name: Lightning Lockdown
skills.desc: Deals 2 Electro DMG, summons Chains of Warding Thunder.

skills.name: Electro Crystal Core
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains an Electro Crystal Core.
